refnamediv.refpurpose: Converts fixed-width field data to XML

refsynopsisdiv.para: If -colnames is specified, its argument is taken to be either a sequence of strings, or a single string which is comma-seperated, which specifies the column names to be used.
If -header is specified, the first row of the fixed file is used as values for column names.

-colspecs is required. Its argument is a sequence or "," deliminted string of column specs. A column spec is either "start-end" or "start", where start and end are integer column positions starting at one. For example "1-3,5-6,7-9" or <[ "1-3" , "5-6" , "7-9" ]>
If -end is omitted, the remainder of the line is used.

refsection.title: Return Value
refsection.para: Returns 0 if the conversion is successful.
